participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, sociable, and passionate about music and nature.
participant_1.background: I'm proud to have a laptop that can keep up with my active lifestyle. I love going to the movies. I listen to folk music. I love fresh vegetables and fruit, especially when I can pick them myself. I am a musician with a day job.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, quirky, and enjoys sharing unique interests with others.
participant_2.background: I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle. I like to relax by looking through my antique collection. I like to go on websites about cats and fashion. I ride a unicycle. My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm a musician with a day job. What do you do for a living?
I'm a blogger. I like to write about my thoughts and opinions on different topics.
That sounds like a fun job! Do you have a favorite topic to write about?
I like to write about my favorite things, like cats and fashion.
I love cats too! I have two of my own.
That's awesome! What kind of cats are they?
One is a tabby and the other is a calico.
They sound adorable! I have a tabby as well.
That's great! We should trade pictures of our cats.
